Sony Xperia P - description and parameters

Sony Xperia P supports frequency bands GSM and HSPA. Official announcement date is February 2012. The deviSony Xperia P

Network, supported bands and technologies TechnologyGSM / HSPA 2G bandsGSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 3G bandsHSDPA 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100 - LT22i SpeedHSPA 14.4/5.76 Mbps GPRSUp to 100 kbps EDGEUp to 296 kbps Release date First presented2012, February StatusAvailable. Released 2012, May Size and Dimensions Measurements122 x 59.5 x 10.5 mm (4.80 x 2.34 x 0.41 in) Weight120 g (4.23 oz) SIMMicro-SIM Display (type and size) TypeLED-backlit LCD, capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors Size4.0 inches Resolution540 x 960 pixels MultitouchYes, up to 4 fingers ProtectionScratch-resistant glass - Sony WhiteMagic technology- Sony Mobile BRAVIA Engine- Timescape UI System and processor information OSAndroid OS, v2.3 (Gingerbread) actualized v4.1 (Jelly Bean) ChipsetNovaThor U8500 Central processing unitDual-core 1 GHz Cortex-A9 Graphics processing unitMali-400 Memory bank Slot for memory cardNo Built-in 1 GB RAM 16 GB (13 GB user available) Camera Primary8 MP, autofocus, LED flash, quality control FeaturesGeo-tagging, quick tap focus, face/smile detection, panorama Video1080p@30fps, quality control SecondaryVGA Sound Different alarm typesVibration; MP3, WAV ringtones Main speaker Yes 3.5mm jack Yes Communication WLANWi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, hotspot, DLNA Bluetoothv2.1, A2DP, EDR GPSYes, with A-GPS NFCYes RadioStereo FM radio ith Radio Data System USBmicroUSB v2.0, USB Host Features SensorsAccelerometer, gyro, proximity sensor, compass MessagingSMS (threaded view), MMS, Email, IM, Push Email BrowserHTML5, Adobe Flash JavaYes, via Java MIDP emulator - HDMI port - noise cancellation feature - MP4/H.264/WMV player - MP3/eAAC+/WMA/WAV player - Organizer - Document viewer - Voice memo/dial/commands - Predictive text input Battery Built-in Li-Ion 1305 mAh battery Stand-byUp to 470 h (2G) / Up to 475 h (3G) Talk timeUp to 6 h (2G) / Up to 5 h (3G) Music playerUp to 80 h Other ColorsSilver, Black, Red
